attributes.review: I support Trump 2020 MEGA!!🇱🇷🇱🇷🌾! But this app is for SNOWFLAKE ❄️ RADICAL LEFT COMMUNISTS!!!! Everything on the app is FAKE NEWS! And this is me when I see news that’s fake: 👨🏻‍🦯 therefore I will NOT being using this horrible app! (I will also NOT be wearing masks, that is part of the radical liberal agenda! COVID-19 is a HOAX and is 🚫FAKE NEWS🚫) When trump says ban ticky Tocks because he can not control what radical Gen Z posts, I say YES! We are America 😎 the government controls us! the government controls us the government controls us the government controls us the government controls us the government controls us the government contr - ahem um TRUMP MEGA 2020 😎😎😎😎😎🇱🇷🇱🇷🇱🇷
attributes.title: Worst App on the App Store

attributes.review: this is a TERRIBLE app 🤮 when i first opened the app i saw a disgusting man in a peach and it made my eyes start BLEEDING 😭💔 when i showed my mom she had a heart attack and started to die 😭😭😭 her funeral is Wednesday 💔💔💔 i had to go to the hospital because my eyes were bleeding so much and i think i need new eyeballs😭 i now get PTSD every single time i look at a cheeto and it’s disgusting. this has broken my heart and i’m greatly disappointed. after i downloaded this app the president came and punched me in the face personally 😭 it scared my pet rock and i and i have an orange handprint left. i am very disappointed
attributes.title: disgusted

attributes.review: i got this app 🤩 expecting it to 😎😎 fill me in on all the most wonderous things our 😚 great president is doing for us!!! but it took seventy-four HOURS to download 🧐 then, when i opened the app after waiting years, the orange cheeto was staring at me!!! then all of the sudden i screamed a blood curtailing scream as the orange man and the national guard broke through my windows and my dog started manically puking!! trumpet- i mean trump then thought it was going to attack him so he had the national guard shoot MY DOG !!! in front of me 😞😭😭😭😭😭 don’t get this app, you will end up with broken windows, puke covered floors, and a dead dog. 😎💖✨🌺🧚🏼‍♂️✨🤩🧚🏼‍♂️
attributes.title: ORANGE ATE MY DOG

attributes.review: I am very disturbed with this app. I was vibing in bed with my chinchilla when I opened it and my chinchilla started eating my phone because a Cheeto popped up. Now my chinchilla is dead and I don’t have a phone. I’m writing this off my refrigerator. Disrespect is at the highest level. I can’t get this image off the Cheeto man out of my head. I’ve bleached my eyes multiple times but it won’t go away. It’s always in the back of my mind and now it is my sleep paralysis demon. Today I’m going to walk my hermit crab and tell everyone about my experience. I can’t believe this. Oh ya and tell baron I said hi😘
attributes.title: My eyes hurt

attributes.review: When I tried to download it it took 20 days to load and once it downloaded my phone started to glitch  a lot and before the app installed my phone was fine and lots of things just popped up on my phone like emojis when I was on the phone and it was not from them and it says inappropriate things that I would not like to read it again and when I’m watching something my phone just randomly turns off and it just terrible and do nails trump emojis just pop up and it is just terrible don’t download this app!
attributes.title: The app is terrible

attributes.title: WORST APP TO EXIST

attributes.review: I have never downloaded such a terrible app in my life. As soon as it finished I opened it expecting to support potus but instead I saw a giant oompa loompa on my screen 😡 I didn’t know this was Charlie and the Chocolate Factory here. It was so ugly that I now have permanent blindness in both of my eyes 😭 my mother is typing this for me while I speak. After I deleted it because of the issues and general low quality I started suffering from uncontrollable vomiting and diarrhea. This NEEDS to be stopped and taken down off of the app store!!! This is unbelievable. If only I could give 0 stars!!!
attributes.title: THE WORST APP

attributes.review: This is just horrible it took 4 years to download and during that time I was paralyzed and all I could do was watch FOX NEWS 🤢🤮🤢🤮🤢I was lucky not converted but prayed that I would die so I would never have to experience this again. I was crying and the doctors said I had no hope but lucky I told them to write this review for me. Please download this app although I know you are Depressed and want to kill yourselves I recommend not doing it with the trump app. I would rather sell my soul then have to go on this app. Please save yourself before it is to late.
attributes.title: This App is killing me 🔪 🏃‍♀️ 🩸 💀

attributes.review: This app took weeks not days WEEKS to download. While waiting it made my other apps glitch, what would happen is it would kick me out of my other apps or would blast music or randomly download Fox News. No other news platforms. Then when it did download it took a week to load out everything, and if you ask me waiting 1 month for ONE APP is too long. I couldn’t put with this anymore so I deleted the app. I ended up getting told the government was tracking my location and everything I say. DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP UNLESS YOU ARE GEN Z AND NOT AFRAID TO DIE.
attributes.title: I can’t believe this.

attributes.review: I wanted to get this app to support my amazing misogynistic president. I thought downloading it would be the best thing since sliced oranges. Unfortunately, downloading the app caused a lot of glitches, one of which was that every time I opened the app, nothing but a picture of a soggy, hairy cheeto wearing a hat that says “make america racist again” would appear. It next began to have racial slurs pop up randomly on my screen before I could click on anything. It then had random videos of children crying and screaming, everytime they saw the president, MY president. Very odd isn’t it?
attributes.title: Very odd isn’t it?
